name: Gun Ugly
description:
Gun Ugly is a surreal comedy action game from another dimension. It arrived by accident to take you on a journey you weren't expecting.

Rise through the ranks of Tactical Chaos Operations, uncover the conspiracy to fracture the multiverse, and save ALL the worlds.

With gunplay inspired by classic FPS games and a story inspired by the ramblings of a madman, Gun Ugly is Gun Ugly.

Key Features

  • A bizarre arsenal of overpowered weapons that you will use
  • Twenty dimension spanning levels - "Twenty's plenty!"
  • A plot that in equal parts entertains, inspires, and brings into question our sanity
  • Over 15 entirely unique enemy types - "Wow, that's 16 enemies"
  • High speed movement mechanics that will make real life feel boring
  • Absurdism
  • Functional graphics that enable the game to be played!
  • Adorable pupples
